definition: Qufu county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong/hometown of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
variant of 麴|曲[qu1]
yeast/Aspergillus (includes many common molds)/Taiwan pr. [qu2]
surname Qu
bent/crooked/wrong
tune/song/CL:支[zhi1]
abundant/mound
Qufu county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong/hometown of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
temple to Confucius in his hometown Qufu

sentences.english: It is the symbol of the Pan River in Qufu, the sacred place for Confucianism and the symbol of local official academic learning.
sentences.chinese: 它是儒家圣地曲阜泮水的象征，也是地方官学的标志。

sentences.english: Taishan, and Yanzhou is only 16 kilometers away from Qufu.
sentences.chinese: 泰安在泰山脚下，曲阜距兖州仅16公里。

sentences.english: The "Genteel Lu" brocade is kind of proper folk textile in Qufu.
sentences.chinese: 在“古典路”博科是一种适当的民间纺织曲阜。

sentences.english: Then he will visit the Temple of Confucius in Qufu.
sentences.chinese: 然后他将参观曲阜的孔庙。

sentences.english: I enjoyed visiting Qufu, where I set flowers at Confucius's tomb.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢参观曲阜，我还在孔子墓前献了花。

sentences.english: Qufu is a county known as the birth place of Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 曲阜是个作为孔子的诞生地而闻名于世的县份。

sentences.english: How about Mt. Taishan and Qufu?
Ronda is the birthplace of modern bullfighting.
Qufu and Confucius are known to many foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 许多外国人都知道曲阜和孔子。

sentences.english: There live many kinds of egrets in the Confucian Temple in Qufu City.
sentences.chinese: 在曲阜的孔庙生活着多种鹭鸟。
